summary: The National Science Foundation supports the design, construction, and operations of science and engineering research infrastructure. We report annually on these NSF-funded projects. NSF has reported delays for all 5 facilities projects in construction that cost $100 million or more, and that additional delays are expected for 2. Eight projects costing $20 million to $100 million are progressing on budget with 2 projects slightly delayed...
title: National Science Foundation: Five Major Facilities Projects Experienced Delays
